name: jonathan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a kind of apple with a red skin and white flesh, used for eating and cooking: She came in from the orchard with a basket full of Jonathans. If I had to choose my favourite apple, it would have to be a Jonathan.
More examplesFewer examplesI like to use Jonathan apples when making apple pie.It might sound a little strange, but his roast pumpkin and Jonathan apple soup is delicious.They grow a mixture of Granny Smiths, Jonathans, Braeburns, and Galas.
